marklogic.body:
A very useful tool. The Rising of Color as Lothrop Stoddard foretold. The time to speak up is now.
I like looking at the New York City area. You can zoom down on the scale and see small census tracts. The Upper East Side is 90 percent White in Spots. As are Spots of Nantucket. Also the East Hamptons as some high White Spots.
Various Spots like Bronxville have higher percentages of Whites. New Rochelle has blacker areas. The Dick Van Dyke Show had the Petries living in New Rochelle as a Whiteopia.
There are a few census tracts in downtown Phily that are White. The main line out near Bryn Mawr is still mostly White but some rising Tide there as well.
Baltimore seems almost completely lost. This is the city of H. L. Mencken. Lost.
The DC suburbs are becoming majority minority, they were once Whiteopias. There are still pockets here or there.
